name: KunKunHome
description:
What is the story of this game?


This is a fictional story in which you play as a KunKun enthusiast named Su Shan, who sneaks into the suspected KunKun residence to explore.

What is the gameplay of this game?


It's a first-person horror game with elements of both horror and comedy. In the game, you need to secretly explore KunKun's residence.

The game includes chase battles and a variety of puzzles.

The game contains some hidden exploration elements, some of which affect the ending.

How many endings are there in this game?


This game contains 2 endings, which are triggered by meeting certain conditions.

The screenshot of the game is as follows：








All content in the game is unrelated to reality, and any similarity is purely coincidental.
The game contains scare elements. If you lack courage, please exit in a timely manner.
